revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubee |model=DVW325 |revision= |fcc_date=02/06/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U10C076 |manuf_rev=T91 |availability= |type=wireless router,cable modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=XCNDVW325,QDS-BRCM1054 |ic_id=4324A-BRCM1054 |pcb_id=U10C076T91 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3383Z |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (half), USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Foxconn U40Z028 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43228 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=battery backup |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=A4:17:31 |oui_eth=A4:17:31 }} "U10C076T91" and "REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*The description in the FCC test report is ''BCM 3383Z Wireless eMTA''. :It is assumed to use [[Broadcom]] BCM3383 (BCM3383Z).
*The wireless module is a ''[[Foxconn]]'' U40Z028 :(''[[Broadcom]]'' BCM943228HM4LD ref. design).
*The FCC photos show it with a DW1530 label :(A4:17:31 OUI on the label).
